site-title: The title of the website shown in browser tab and header
home: Navigation label for the home page
upload: Navigation label for the upload page
preference: Navigation label for the preferences page
about: Navigation label for the about page
login: Button/link text for logging into the application
logout: Button/link text for logging out of the application
source-code:
Text showing source code availability with link
Parameters:
* {{github}} - GitHub platform link wrapped in <0> tags
github: Text for GitHub platform name used as a parameter in source-code message
tool-info1: First paragraph of tool description on the home page
tool-info2: Second paragraph with detailed tool description and functionality
login-to-upload-images: Message prompting users to login before uploading
start-uploading: Button text to begin upload process
learn-more: Link text to get more information
404-text: Explanatory text shown on 404 error page
back-to-home: Link text to return to home page
enter-source-url: Label for source URL input field
select-project-and-language: Heading for project and language selection section
complete-all-fields: Error message for incomplete form fields
edit-error: Error message for failed page edit
poll-error:
Error message for task status polling
Parameters:
* {{pollError}} - specific error message from the polling operation
content-not-found: Error message when uploaded file content is missing
fetch-content-error: Error message for failed content retrieval
invalid-source-url: Error message for invalid source URL format
finish-without-edit: Button text to complete without editing
finish-with-edit: Button text to complete with editing
view-wiki-page: Link text to view the wiki page
go-back-to-home: Link text to return to home page
source-url-placeholder: Placeholder text showing example source URL
target-file-name-placeholder: Placeholder text showing example target filename
upload-file-to-target-wiki: Button text for uploading to target wiki
enter-valid-project-language: Validation message for project and language selection
target-file-name-invalid: Error message for invalid target filename
target-file-name-exist: Error message for duplicate target filename
skip-selection: Label for checkbox to skip project/language selection
